articles.title: Kìwekì Point damage caused by school bus driving along pathway
articles.description: The NCC confirmed that a rogue school bus driver drove on the path illegally causing damage to the wooden panels of the structure at Kìwekì Point.

articles.title: Perry Bamonte, guitarist and keyboardist for The Cure, dies at 65
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Perry Archangelo Bamonte, longtime guitarist and keyboardist for the influential goth band The Cure, has died. He was 65. articles.description: Nineteen undocumented migrants of Haitian origin were arrested in southern Quebec Thursday evening, the RCMP said. They have all requested asylum.

articles.title: Mission hospital to close overnight from Dec. 29 to Jan. 6
articles.description: Beginning Monday, Dec. 29 until Tuesday, Jan. 6, the emergency department at Mission's hospital will operate daily from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., closing overnight. Full emergency coverage will resume on Jan. 7 at 8 a.m.
